definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
thousand articles, same rule (idiom); stereotyped and repetitive/once you've seen one, you've seen them all

sentences.english: Also remember that one size does not fit all when optimizing pages.
sentences.chinese: 還要記住，在對頁面進行優化時不要千篇一律。

sentences.english: Amazon Appstore apps are only available to customers located in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 更絕，無論免費收費，一律只限美國國內下載。

sentences.english: Photon Cannons, or the little hand thingies.
sentences.chinese: 光子炮，便是那個小手一律澳門新澳門賭場東西。

sentences.english: Presidents have invariably also been Protestants and two-thirds of them have been college graduates.
sentences.chinese: 總統千篇一律是新教徒，而且三分之二是大學畢業生。

sentences.english: Anyone who reached the age of fifty or a bit over --- he was to be done away with.
sentences.chinese: 超過五十歲包括五十歲的人，一律被處死。

sentences.english: There was no large window in the room, and the chestnut windows were all wooden.
sentences.chinese: 屋子沒有大窗口，那栗色的窗子又一律是木格的。

sentences.english: In the course of cooperation, equality of all countries must be adhered to as a matter of principle.
sentences.chinese: 要堅持各國在合作進程中一律平等的原則。

sentences.english: The believers and the non-believers are politically equal.
sentences.chinese: 信教的和不信教的，在政治上一律平等。

sentences.english: All the routine work really bores me to death.
sentences.chinese: 每天千篇一律的工作真的煩死我了。

sentences.english: A:All the routine work really browns me off.
sentences.chinese: 每天千篇一律的工作真讓我討厭。

sentences.english: My friend turns up his nose at anyone who hasn't had a college education.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友對沒有受過大學教育的人一律瞧不起。

sentences.english: Please use recent one-inch ID photos.
sentences.chinese: 一律使用近期一寸正面免冠照片。

sentences.english: Any one who collaborates should be shot.
sentences.chinese: 與敵人勾結者一律槍決。

sentences.english: Subheads should be placed in the middle of the column.; Centre the subheads.
To avoid monotony, we must always find something fresh, new.
sentences.chinese: 爲了避免千篇一律，我們必鬚髮掘新意。

sentences.english: Only ticket-holders were given admission and all others were roped out.
sentences.chinese: 只有持票者才准入內，其他人員一律被攔在繩子外面。

definition: must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
must/to need to/to be sure to
to exclude/not including sth (when counting or listing)/except for
